CustomField.formula: CASE(Model__c, "GPA", CASE(GPA_Country_short_name__c, "DE", GPA_Postal_code_short_name__c, "DO", GPA_Postal_code_short_name__c, "VE", GPA_Postal_code_short_name__c, "HU", GPA_Postal_code_short_name__c, "AT", GPA_Postal_code_short_name__c, "SE", GPA_Postal_code_short_name__c, "FI", GPA_Postal_code_short_name__c, "KR", GPA_Postal_code_short_name__c, "UY", GPA_Postal_code_short_name__c, "CZ", GPA_Postal_code_short_name__c, "" ) , "XAL", CASE(CountryCode__c, "AR", PostalCodeName__c, "CL", PostalCodeName__c, "HK", "X", "LA", PostalCodeName__c, "KH", PostalCodeName__c, "MM", PostalCodeName__c, "SG", PostalCodeName__c, "PH", PostalCodeName__c, "TH", PostalCodeName__c, "BD", PostalCodeName__c, "MY", PostalCodeName__c, "TW", PostalCodeName__c, "JP", PostalCodeName__c, "CZ", PostalCodeName__c, "" ), /* at this time XAL does not include postal codes */ "")
CustomField.label: Global PostalCode Code
